forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Fog early, then cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Fog early, then mostly cloudy after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
